name: Merces to Money
description: "Lord have Merces," what does that even mean?  Converts every instance (possible) of "Merces" or using the Merces icon to a currency of your choice.

options.tooltip: When enabled, this option will replace Merces and the [=M=] icon with USD ($).

english.400465776: Enables or disables the money indicator.

english.1096658276:
Eliminate any Target with an Epic or Legendary Melee Item.
  • If you are lucky and have enough money, you can get Epic and Legendary Weapons from Suppliers.
english.1121983643: Eliminate Leader - Oil or Water Canister Trap (+ ${0})
english.1283474911:
Eliminate any Target with an Epic or Legendary Shotgun.
  • If you are lucky and have enough money, you can get Epic and Legendary Weapons from Suppliers.
english.1285453514:
Eliminate any Target with an Epic or Legendary Sniper Rifle.
  • If you are lucky and have enough money, you can get Epic and Legendary Weapons from Suppliers.
english.1585377214:
Eliminate any Target with an Epic or Legendary SMG.
  • If you are lucky and have enough money, you can get Epic and Legendary Weapons from Suppliers.
english.1728303616:
Eliminate any Target with an Epic or Legendary Silenced Pistol.
  • If you are lucky and have enough money, you can get Epic and Legendary Weapons from Suppliers.
english.3021127136: Eliminate Leader - Heading for a Meeting (+ ${0})
english.3247389614:
Eliminate any Target with an Epic or Legendary Unsilenced Pistol.
  • If you are lucky and have enough money, you can get Epic and Legendary Weapons at the Suppliers.
english.3972544642: Do not Get Caught on Camera (+ ${0}) {1}

english.29266249: Safes around the level can be opened, and contain money. Find nearby clues and scan them with your Camera to unlock the Safe.
english.603712913: Payout Objectives are optional objectives for missions in Freelancer. When successfully completing a mission, a payout in cash ($) is granted for each completed Payout Objective. There is no penalty if you don't complete a Payout Objective. Only an expert Freelancer can complete them all.
english.1836044446: Suppliers are undercover arms dealers that sell a variety of Gear, as long as you have enough money. This can be of a different rarity (Common, Rare, Epic or Legendary). Gear with rarity can always be brought back to the Safehouse.
english.2003461988: Prestige Objectives are additional optional objectives that can be added to a selected mission from the Safehouse. When successfully completing the mission, a payout in cash ($) is granted if the selected Prestige Objective is also completed.
english.3677756057: Couriers carry currency that you can steal.

english.1220079315: The lingua franca of the world's currencies, the U.S. Dollar is a strong and prevalent money that can be used for goods and services provided on missions. With low tracability and solid support, the USD is a safe valuta for a person keeping a low profile.

options.tooltip: When enabled, this option will replace Merces and the [=M=] icon with the euro (€).

There is no penalty if you don't complete a Payout Objective. Only an expert Freelancer can complete them all.
english.1836044446: Suppliers are undercover arms dealers that sell a variety of Gear, as long as you have enough money. This can be of a different rarity (Common, Rare, Epic or Legendary). Gear with rarity can always be brought back to the Safehouse.

english.1220079315: The official currency for 20 out of 27 members of the European Union, the euro is a strong and stable currency prevalent almost anywhere in Europe. With low tracability and solid support, the euro is a safe valuta for a person keeping a low profile.

options.tooltip: When enabled, this option will replace Merces and the [=M=] icon with the pound sterling (£).

english.1220079315: The oldest currency still in use and fourth-most-traded in foreign markets, the pound sterling is a part of the "basket of currencies" that influences the value of the IMF's drawing rights. If found in the United Kingdom or in one of their overseas territories, the pound sterling is a safe valuta for a person keeping a low profile.

options.name: Fr.
options.tooltip: When enabled, this option will replace Merces and the [=M=] icon with the Swiss franc (in absence of an official symbol, francs are represented as "Fr." after currencies).

english.1220079315: The official currency of the Swiss Confederation's lawless banks, the franc is a stable currency with low inflation. With solid support across the European Union, Switzerland's franc is a safe valuta for a person keeping a low profile.

options.name: RWN - $
options.tooltip: (Compatibility: Aly's Realistic Weapon Names)  Uses USD as currency.  When enabled, this option changes the Freelancer "Fiber Wire Kill" objective to "Fibre Wire Kill" should you want the Classic-style Fiber Wire renames in RWN.  IF YOU ARE USING "Default" OR "Compromise" IN RWN, YOU SHOULD NOT SELECT THIS.

options.name: RWN - €
options.tooltip: (Compatibility: Aly's Realistic Weapon Names)  Uses the euro as its currency.  When enabled, this option changes the Freelancer "Fiber Wire Kill" objective to "Fibre Wire Kill" should you want the Classic-style Fiber Wire renames in RWN.  IF YOU ARE USING "Default" OR "Compromise" IN RWN, YOU SHOULD NOT SELECT THIS.
